mapper.select: select ID id, MESSAGE_NAME name, MESSAGE_CONTENT content, MESSAGE_PHONE phone, MESSAGE_EMAIL email, REPLY_ID replyId, CREATE_TIME createTime from tb_message tm where tm.DELETE_FLAG = '1' and tm.REPLY_ID is null ORDER BY tm.CREATE_TIME DESC

select ID id, MESSAGE_NAME name, MESSAGE_CONTENT content, MESSAGE_PHONE phone, MESSAGE_EMAIL email, REPLY_ID replyId, CREATE_TIME createTime from tb_message tm where tm.DELETE_FLAG = '1' and tm.REPLY_ID = #{replyId} ORDER BY tm.CREATE_TIME ASC
mapper.insert: insert into tb_message( MESSAGE_NAME, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_PHONE, MESSAGE_EMAIL, REPLY_ID, CREATE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG )values ( #{name}, #{content}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{replyId}, now(), '1' )
